title: Workout Plans
description: Create and manage your workout plans

list.emptyDescription: Create a plan to save your favorite workout routines

form.createDescription: Create a new workout plan with your custom set of exercises
form.editDescription: Update the details and exercises of your workout plan
form.addExerciseDescription: Select exercises from the list to add to your plan
form.name: Plan Name
form.namePlaceholder: e.g., Push Day, Leg Day, Full Body
form.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
form.nameMaxLength: Name must be at most 50 characters
form.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be at most 200 characters
form.exercisesMinLength: Plan must have at least 1 exercise
form.exercisesMaxLength: Plan can have at most 15 exercises
form.noExercisesHint: Tap the button above to add exercises

exercise.weightRange: Weight must be between 0 and 1000 kg
exercise.notesMaxLength: Notes must be at most 200 characters

selector.title: Start Workout
selector.fromPlanDescription: Choose a plan to start with

delete.title: Delete Plan?
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

toast.maxPlansError: You've reached the maximum of 30 plans

errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to modify this plan
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
